sentences.en: Computing science was still in its infancy.
sentences.cn: 计算科学仍然处于初期阶段。

sentences.en: For my infancy, there was nothing in it remarkable.
sentences.cn: 我的幼年时代无甚出奇之处.

sentences.en: Genetic engineering is still in its infancy.
sentences.cn: 基因工程学仍处于起步阶段。

sentences.en: He came to England in his infancy.
He has been bright from infancy.
I'm sure you have heard of his precarious infancy.
sentences.cn: 我相信你们都曾听说过他多灾多难的幼年.

sentences.en: M - commerce is still in its infancy, even in Finland.
sentences.cn: 即使在芬兰,移动商务也仍处于襁褓阶段.

sentences.en: The industry was still in its infancy.
sentences.cn: 这一产业当时仍处于发展初期.
无线电广播的初期阶段

sentences.en: The invention is still in its infancy.
sentences.cn: 该项发明仍处于初级阶段.

sentences.en: The production of commodities, in other words, production for sale, was still in its infancy.
sentences.cn: 商品的生产, 换言之, 即以售卖为目的的生产, 仍在幼稚时期.

sentences.en: The project was cancelled while it was still in its infancy.
sentences.cn: 这项目尚处于初期阶段时就取消了.

sentences.en: Their research is only in its infancy.
sentences.cn: 他们的研究处于初级阶段.

sentences.en: This research is only in its infancy.
sentences.cn: 这一研究尚处于起始阶段.

sentences.en: This third stage of development of electronics is still in his infancy.
sentences.cn: 电子学发展的第三阶段仍处在它的幼年时期.

sentences.en: We were all in our wartime infancy.
sentences.cn: 我们大家都处于战争的初期阶段.

words.tran_cn: 婴儿的；幼稚的；初期的；未成年的
幼稚症；[医] 幼稚型，[医] 婴儿型

trans.tran_cn: 婴儿期，幼年时代，初期，摇篮时代，[法]未成年
trans.tran_en: the period of a child’s life before they can walk or talk
